column2: What fleet name will occupy this shift. This is a pick list from the 5-Fleet
If dedicated vehicle(s) will always be assigned to this shift enter the vehichle IDs here. Please make sure it matches the vehicles provided in section 5-Fleet
If dedicated driver(s) will always be assigned to this shift enter their name(s) here. Please make sure it matches the driver names provided in section 9-People
A helpful text for shift identification. This label is displayed to the driver in the driver app and operator dashboard. Click here to see a pic
The start and end of time of when trips can be booked. Pre/Post vehicle inspection is not within this time window
Enter the details of up to 3 breaks for each shift. Insert more rows if additional breaks are needed.
How many vehicles will claim this shift
